message: So basically there are three places where things can go wrong
Plus there's the whole problem that we have different life experience, where all three steps go correctly, but we have different frames of reference
So how do we error-correct? Let's look to science.
Science allows you to make predictions.
His friend said "facts aren't always true"
First you have to have an idea
Then you have to express that idea in words
Then your friend has to listen and interpret those words into an idea
"did you just say that facts are always true?"
"say that again, just don't use the words facts, or true"
"Sometimes when you get information from someone, it's not always correct"
